channel.title: The "random url" thread
channel.description:
Well, I'm bored, so I wanted to try and start a little forum game. The title well, says 95% of the game.
How to play: It's rather simple, most of us use Google Chrome, Opera, or Mozillia Firefox. They all support typing in a url partially, and hitting enter would send you to it. Sometime's we'll (everyone does it) make a mistake and it'll either A) take you to a internet search, or B) take you to an unknown website. Well all you do is post the website (if it searched, post the first non-advertised site in the results) that it took you to.
Example: I was going to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf today, and instead I typed mops and found www.mops.org/ (Mothers of preschoolers).
The rules: You cannot post any url that could lead to bad pornographic, or graphic content of any sort. You cannot post any random url, they must be accidental. (see example) [size=5pt]Rules subject to change[/size]
Simple, yes. Lame, yes. But lets see where this goes.

item.title: The "random url" thread
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:2, topic:477094”]sourmath.com <------------------Don’t go O.o/pics of old men
Ontopic: this is dumb, I just can’t mistype moparscape, If i tried to intentionally go there maybe google or youtube if you mistype youtube it brings u to a survey site
if u miss a g in google its something bad

and picosographic?[/quote]
Lol I didn’t type picsographic… I don’t even know how that got there.
I’ll edit it.
I never said it had to be moparscape. and for me to get to this site all I have to do is type mo and press enter, so I just happen to press an S.

Plus, if it’s “Dumb” Then don’t participate.

Read full topic
